Summary: close range encounter of glowing sphere
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were driving down the entrance to a campground on clearwater lake about nine thirty pm when a glowing red sphere came out of the woods about 150 feet ahead of me and headed toward our car. i was going about thirty mph and the object was coming toward me at about the same speed following a slightly wavy path. it came within a couple of feet of the hood of my car and then raised up a little and flew over the drivers side fender and right past my open window about thirty inches from my face. i could have reached out and touched it. it was about the size of a soccer ball and perfectly spherical and glowed red the color of the brake lights on a car. i looked back after it passed and watched it follow a wavy path down the road behind me until it went around a curve and wasn't visible any more. we just stopped the car and sat there in awe of what we'd both seen.
